duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, operate, and maintain complex technology systems using engineering principles, theories, and concepts.
Translate real-world needs into technical specifications and develop engineering solutions for defense projects.
Create capability analysis, system architectures, and analysis of alternatives for growing technical areas of Directed Energy applications with High-Power Microwave technologies.
Write technical documentation such as Systems Engineering Plans (SEPs) and Systems Requirements Documents (SRDs), and perform systems engineering services in all phases of a project life cycle.
Analyze customer capabilities, develop requirements, and perform trade study design and execution.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Science, or Technology (Master’s degree preferred)
